lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Good morning. How can I help you today?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Hi, I've been having really bad headaches for the past two weeks. They come almost every day now.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you describe the headaches? Where do you feel the pain?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: It's usually on both sides of my head, kind of like a tight band around my forehead. Sometimes it goes to the back of my neck too.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: How would you rate the pain on a scale from 1 to 10?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: It's usually about a 6 or 7. Sometimes it gets up to an 8 when it's really bad.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Do you notice anything that triggers the headaches?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Stress seems to make them worse. I've been under a lot of pressure at work lately. Also, I've been spending a lot of time on the computer.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any nausea, vomiting, or sensitivity to light?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: No nausea or vomiting, but I do get a bit sensitive to bright lights when the headache is bad.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Have you tried any over-the-counter medications?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I've been taking ibuprofen, about 400mg, two or three times a day. It helps a little but doesn't fully go away.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: How's your sleep been? Are you getting enough rest?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Honestly, not great. I've been sleeping maybe 5 hours a night. I have trouble falling asleep because of the stress.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Do you drink caffeine regularly?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Yeah, I probably have about 4 or 5 cups of coffee a day. Sometimes more when I'm really tired.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any changes in your vision or any numbness or tingling?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: No, nothing like that.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any history of headaches or migraines in your family?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: My mom gets migraines. She's been dealing with them her whole life.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Okay, let me do a quick neurological exam and we'll talk about a plan.

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: That would be great. I just want to find something that works because it's really affecting my work.
